divs: sighting detailsit was summer of 1980 or 1981 around 11:00 p.m., when i went outside for a minute. i looked up and was shocked to see a huge disc above my house. it had lights around the edges and was completely silent. it hovered for a short time and then swooped off so fast you could hardly see it go. i jumped in the car to go to the top of the hill only a few hundred yards away, but by then i couldn't tell it from a star. the waterbury republican\american ran a small column on the front page about the 800 or so calls they had received about a ufo. it had visited a nearby drive-in movie theater, [where my brother happened to be at the time]. the next day, it was dismissed as an "advertising balloon" from bob's surplus store. (what a joke!)
Summary: Gigantic disc hovering over my house, lights around the rim, sped off unbelievably fast
